actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

official_title: To repeal the authority of the President to suspend the prevailing wage requirements of the Davis-Bacon Act during times of national emergency and to reinstate the application of such requirements to Federal contracts in areas affected by Hurricane Katrina.

summary.text: Repeals the President's authority to suspend the prevailing wage requirements of the Davis-Bacon Act during times of national emergency. Reinstates the application of such requirements to federal contracts in counties affected by Hurricane Katrina, notwithstanding the President's proclamation dated September 8, 2005, or any other provision of law.

titles.title: To repeal the authority of the President to suspend the prevailing wage requirements of the Davis-Bacon Act during times of national emergency and to reinstate the application of such requirements to Federal contracts in areas affected by Hurricane Katrina.
